title: does your leaverbuster time reset?
body: i left a few times, received 10 min ban, then played consecutive games for a week or 2 only to receive 5 20 min bans after leaving ONE game... WTF?

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.
Yes, it does reset. But it takes longer than simply playing the 5 game penalty.

Hi, so my computer crashed and it resulted in me having to leave my game, and this is the first time I went AFK for like 6 or 7 months, yet this time I have five 20 minute bans. How long does it take for the leave buster penalty to reset?{{champion:51}}
Don't AFK. Problem solved!

I don't afk, I leave. Sometimes unexpected things pop up in life and I need to attend to them.
:(

AFKing and leaving are the the same, really.

When you leave or AFK you are affecting the game for 9 other people. I understand sometimes life can throw curveballs, but I would encourage you to only play when you know you can commit to finishing a game session.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=dMLBXxRl,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-11-07T21:31:43.638+0000)
>
> AFKing and leaving are the the same, really.
> 
> When you leave or AFK you are affecting the game for 9 other people. I understand sometimes life can throw curveballs, but I would encourage you to only play when you know you can commit to finishing a game session.

OP, you responded to me and this would be my response.  I'd also add that I have a 3 year old daughter (whom is awesome btw) and she can interrupt me at any time. I still don't leave or afk and make sure she's down for a nap or someone else can watch her if I queue up.  It's your responsibility to make sure you've got time to play.

RIOT can't justify any excuse because any excuse you may have is irrelevant to the 9 other people whose game you just ruined.  Things happen. And that one game that your ISP blows up (happened to me, Verizon took down a major backbone cable mid game and it affected thousands of players) isn't enough to warrant a leaverbuster. But when you consistently and, in this case,  willfully leave or afk a game it needs to be made certain that you understand it's not acceptable and RIOT takes steps to shield the community from what you're doing.
it should reset every season though
They only reset when you play enough games, and don't go afk in them. You'll have a message pop down below the store area saying your standing has increased or something like that.
I get last time Leaverbuster 1 year ago... 20min GG (ps: get leaverbuster today cuz lol dont connect to game and they remake...)

I have the same problem. Every time my computer either makes league crash or just simply dc's me halfway. I really want to reset my leaverbuster but i cant bc it just keeps happening. I can't get a new computer. Anyone help plz?

Submit a support ticket, they may  be able to provide you with steps to take to try to stabilize your computer. If you're playing on WIFI you may be DC-ing due to packet loss, there are solutions for that as well, although they require access to your router.
Hal get on the boards discord real quick.

You were asking for somebody I figured even though I'm not an arbiter/warden I might be able to help you out with answers.

Ah, thank you. I appreciate that. However this is something that will require specifically moderator or Rioter with direct knowledge about something specific.

Thanks for offering to help though.
